ai-anya-e0105n32:1_0: Your teacher isvatī in the direction of the Buddha, the past the future, and the large dwelling, of the most senior monk. He’s not a single dwellings, the eight, ninety, or a hundred thousandth part.
ai-anya-e0105n32:1_1: and gained eight portions in the present.
ai-anya-e0105n32:3_0: by means of the junior monk and he asked by for Soṇa.
ai-anya-e0105n32:5_0: lust for, for the purpose of lust, and the next.
ai-anya-e0105n32:7_0: I’ll proceed you that doubt, beauty, happiness, glory, sores that you can find peace.
ai-anya-e0105n32:8_0: ‘I survive substantial wealth, Sīha, and owing to the lion.
ai-anya-e0105n32:9_0: a large dwelling, the monks of nuns, or the dwellings.
ai-anya-e0105n32:11_0: all kinds of words, stalking out these eight parts, and consummate ones.
